bug.author: toslunar
bug.description: I found the tests in take more than 10 min at <denchmark-link:https://ci.appveyor.com/project/pfnet/chainer/builds/19508895/job/20x0p70k42glbu08>https://ci.appveyor.com/project/pfnet/chainer/builds/19508895/job/20x0p70k42glbu08</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: The tests are skipped with (AppVeyor, Python 2) in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chainer/chainer/pull/4972>#4972</denchmark-link> since it's so slow to timeout. The issue claims it's also slow with (AppVeyor, Python 3).
